casebody.data:
Bernard J. MALONE, as trustee in Bankruptcy of Little Falls Dairy Company, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. David GIMPEL, Defendant-Appellee. No. 202, Docket 24322. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued March 6, 1957. Decided March 28, 1957. James A. McTiernan, Little Falls, N. Y., for plaintiff-appellant. Bartle Gorman, Utica, N. Y. (J. Walter Augar, Utica, N. Y„ on the Brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before MEDINA and WATERMAN, Circuit Judges, and GALSTON, District Judge-

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of Judge Brennan, D.C., 151 F.Supp. 549.
